name: Alton jones
coverLetter:
Hi I am new to the industry but I am willing to work any position and any open shift as a trimmer for the Los Angeles, Orange County, and Riverside County areas. If there are other positions that offer housing but are in the central or northern California region and offers temporary housing I am also open to those positions. I am flexible, professional, hard working, and dependable. 

Thank you for the consideration
